creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: hand scroll, alternating panels of calligraphy and imagery; images of men at a shrine; a man and woman in a bamboo grove; carpenters building a structure; of men gathered in a long, open hall, and of people and a dog sleeping in a house
marks:
Title, Inscriptions

Inscriptions inside when rolled, title adhered to top
title: The Kasuga Gongen Miracles, Vol. 1
